root.name: Sports Trivia
root.description: The ultimate sports trivia game for Game Gear tests your knowledge of sports with hundreds of questions covering 11 different sports. Football, basketball, baseball, hockey, golf, tennis, boxing, auto racing, the Olympics - they're all here, including up-to-date 1995 statistics!Sports Trivia combines brain-twisting trivia with hard-hitting football game play. Your answers determine the effectiveness of offensive plays, defensive plays, field goals, kick returns and more. Answer single questions to grind out yards on the ground. Or answer multiple questions to go for the end zone!Whether you're matching wits with the CPU, or going one-on-one with a friend, Sports Trivia is the ultimate test of your sports intelligence. Take your best Shot!Taken directly out of the manual.
